situation.title: Slovakia
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations for the people arriving to and departing from Slovakia.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

People arriving in Slovakia from the Czech Republic must have a negative PCR test max. 72 hours old. As an alternative, they can register via the e-border form, enter domestic quarantine, and get tested at least 5 days after the arrival.

Exceptions to the above quarantine, registration, and test obligations apply to:

  • drivers of haulage, bus and rail transport;
  • with the consent of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Slovak Republic, persons arriving for the purpose of acute diagnosis and treatment, incl. people close to them;
  • citizens of the EU Member States and their family members  transiting through the territory of Slovakia to another EU Member State (transit means a transit for a maximum of 8 hours without stopping, except for refueling; this exception also applies when changing means of transportation, e.g. for arrival after country to and from the international airport);
  • people coming for the purpose of enforcing a court decision in the matter of parents' alternating care for minor children;
  • employees of operators of critical infrastructure elements in the energy and industry sectors;
  • cross-border workers up to a distance of 30 km from an open border crossing point;
  • people with a permanent or temporary residence permit in the Czech Republic who are studying in Slovakia or going to take entrance exams to study, incl. one accompanying person;
  • persons with a permanent or temporary residence permit in the states neighboring Slovakia, who come to Slovakia due to urgent care for close family members, incl. one accompanying person;
  • persons with a permanent or temporary residence permit in the Czech Republic who manage land on the territory of Slovakia at a distance of max. 10 km from the state border;
  • persons coming from the Czech Republic for the purpose of production of an audiovisual work, submission of an artistic performance, or realization of a work of art.

For the return from Slovakia, which is currently on the list of so-called "red states", apply the following measure: Return from abroad from a place with a higher risk of infection (CZ Návrat ze zahraničí z místa s vyšším rizikem nákazy).

Before entering the Czech Republic, passengers must fill in an arrival form and pass a PCR test or go to quarantine. However, there are several exceptions that you will find in the measure above or on the web page of the Ministry of interior affairs. 

More details can be found here.
